mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${schema}.wq_tutor_application(user_id, brief_introduction, create_time, update_time, status, current_city, current_state, teach_method, hourly_rate, late_policy_id, cancellation_policy_id, education_background_ids, subject_topics_ids, support_material_ids) VALUES (#{userId}, #{briefIntroduction}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{status}, #{currentCity}, #{currentState}, #{teachMethod}, #{hourlyRate}, #{latePolicyId}, #{cancellationPolicyId}, #{educationBackgroundIds}, #{subjectTopicsIds}, #{supportMaterialIds});
